newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures finish sharply lower.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures finish sharply lower.

text.p: Feb 26 - IMM currency futures finished sharply lower. Traders look for March marks to fall through the contract low at $0.5875 and March yen to break below its contract low of $0.008044 in the near term. Hedge fund selling was heavy in the pits after the U.S. dollar rallied out of ranges. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com))
